name: Ben Lipton's blog
tagline: Putting stuff where I can find it later
body:
# Hello there.

This summer I'm going to be doing some work on the [FreeIPA](https://www.freeipa.org/) project, and I will use this space to talk about some of what I'm doing and write down things I've figured out. Hopefully they will be useful to somebody, or at least to me when I forget them later.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
